title: AI & Machine Learning Fundamentals
description: Introduces neural networks, data modeling, and AI tools like Gemini to transform daily work.

title: Cloud Infrastructure Management (AWS/Azure)
description: Essential training on data storage, scaling applications, and managing cloud resources.

title: Cybersecurity & Ethical Hacking
description: Digital hygiene, threat identification, password management, and data protection.

title: Data Science & Visualization (Python/R)
description: Clean, analyze, and visually present large datasets to inform business decisions.

title: Front-End Web Development (React/Angular)
description: Building modern, responsive user interfaces for web-based products.

title: Occupational Risk Assessment (HIRA)
description: Identify, categorize, and mitigate physical and procedural hazards (Safety Compliance).

title: Basic Computer Literacy & Digital Fundamentals
description: OS basics, file management, email etiquette, and MS Office/Google Workspace.

title: Professional Business Writing & Communication
description: Clarity, brevity, and professionalism in business documents and reports.

title: Workplace First Aid & CPR (Level 1)
description: Immediate life-saving skills meeting health and safety requirements.

title: Personal Financial Literacy & Budgeting
description: Budgeting, managing debt, and savings principles for employee wellness.
